# **How to make QR code in google sheet using Integromat.com.**

The goal of this section is to create QRcode in Google Sheet

<img src="/post/2018-09-18-how-to-make-qr-code-in-google-sheet-using-integromat-com_files/GoogleSheet_QRcode2_Screen Shot 2018-09-19 at 7.43.47 AM.png" width=400px align="top">

by using Intergromat.com[^1]!

<img src="/post/2018-09-18-how-to-make-qr-code-in-google-sheet-using-integromat-com_files/QRcode_generator1_Kazu2a_Screen Shot 2018-09-19 at 7.19.12 AM.png" width=400px align="middle" alt="QRcode generator1a">


## Outline

(@) Create [Integromat.com](https://www.integromat.com) account (free for 100 MB transfer and/or 1000 operation)
(@) Link Integromat.com account to your Google accout (for using Google Driv, Sheet)
(@) Create a new Google sheet with "sample","url","QRcode" columns.
(@) Create a new Scenario and run once to test it.

## How to create QRcode generator scenario.

(@) Follow directions to create a new scenario (Tutorials in [help](https://support.integromat.com/hc/en-us) in Integromat.com is useful).
(@) Details of my QRcode generator v1 is described below.
